verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Magnify the Lord; sing His praises.
Magnify the Lord; sing His praises.
He has done great things; we are glad.
We rejoice in You, our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Magnify the Lord; sing His praises.
Magnify the Lord; sing His praises.
He has brought us forth with His right arm,
And He will lead us on.
